column2: ITP009-11 - Electrical Fit-out of Existing SIT Pits
column8: ITP009-11 - Electrical Fit-out of Existing SIT Pits

column2: 1.0 Electrical Fit-out of Existing SIT Pits
Acceptance Criteria: Prior to entering pit, power to be isolated to the satisfaction of the Principal and other relevant authorities. Equipment removed and pit cleaned.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 011
Acceptance Criteria: Primary and secondary cables installed, along with transformers, primary connector joints, and earthing cable.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 011
Acceptance Criteria: Earth cable terminated from lug and reposition SIT holder.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 011
Acceptance Criteria: Energise circuits and test lights.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 011
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
